professional_summary: Analytics professional with over six years of experience driving data-driven insights and supporting decision-making through cost analysis, pricing restructuring, and database management.

key_responsibilities: Analyzed and implemented cost and pricing data through ETL.
Implemented margin recommendations to drive gross profit margin by two points.
Conducted competitor product line analysis to save $70
Maintained web catalog database using SQL extracts.
Performed quantitative analysis for pricing adjustments.
Supported sales team with margin optimization best practices.
Maintained and developed sell pricing structures.
Provided technical advice to purchasing personnel on data analysis.
Analyzed vendor SPA pricing for strategic recommendations.
Prepared monthly reports for senior management.
Created dashboards and GIS maps for market insights.
Conducted reviews of process improvement initiatives.
Supported marketing projects with cross-functional teams.
Coordinated logistics and budget planning for events.
